entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Slave Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -22.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
